metadata.title: CVE-2024-57645 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the qi_inst_state_free component of openlinkvirtuoso-opensource v7.2.11 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service(DoS) via crafted SQL statements.

criterions.comment: virtuoso-opensource package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
